Text: Please seed. My ratio on this is already 10, and the availability on it is 1.9
hey mine wont work it keeps crashing out right after starting it please help

Yeah, this game always had problems with certain video cards, try running it in fullscreen, if not that, try windowed, make sure you have DirectX 9, and your video card drivers are up to date. You could also possibly run it in compatability mode.

Hold F on startup and see if that fixes the problem.

Game worked well, I put the base_xp.tah and omake_xp.tah files into a new folder, then I was suposed to rename ObsDX9old.exe to ObsDX9.exe, but there is no ObsDX9old.exe file, so Ijust moved the ObsDX9.censored file to the new folder and the uncensored game started with no problems; Thanks Aderic.

No prob :D. If you leave the .tah files where they currently are though, that should keep the expansions, ObsDX9.censored is just the ObsDX9.exe censored original version. You can delete it if you plan on never running it censored, or alternatively you can rename it to ObsDX9.exe and run it and the game will be censored.
Thanks! I didn't have to rename or even extract anything, or anything. xD Only took 2 hours to DL, and runs smoothly. Really fun to play with. Thanks again. :3

Interesting game, tested & it works on windows 7 64Bit, the only thing is.... When you run the game, it conveniently starts up your webcam! 

.....Interesting indeed.

@cyrixmk. After a quick search on the intergoogle, I found out that the xp pack has a free update in it that goves the game motion tracking, so that all the girls will stare at you in a creepy manner. I've tried disabling my cam, but it made the game not work, so that may also be the problem for people who have no webcam, or have it disabled.
Edit. It moves the screen with your head.
